paper_abstract: We prove the existence of fuzzy common fixed point of two mappings satisfying a generalized contractive condition in complete ordered spaces. Our results provide extension as well as substantial improvements of several well-known results in the existing literature and initiate the study of fuzzy fixed point theorems in ordered spaces. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Common fuzzy fixed point theorems in ordered metric spaces
